tldr_points: Product knowledge encompasses customer needs, industry trends, brand mission, competitor analysis, and company policies beyond basic features
Comprehensive product training boosts employee confidence, improves customer service quality, increases sales, and builds lasting customer trust
Effective training requires accessible knowledge bases, instructor-led demonstrations, handouts, and regular testing with simulated customer scenarios
Docsie enables teams to create collaborative product documentation with multi-language support, version control, and easy stakeholder sharing
